title: Deals: AirPods Pro 2 with Hearing Aid Functionality for $190, Apple Watch Series 10 for $329, & More

excerpt: Amazon is offering some fantastic deals on various Apple products, including the AirPods Pro 2 with Hearing Aid Functionality, Apple Watch Series 10, and the M4 series of MacBook Pro models.
text: Amazon is offering some fantastic deals on various Apple products, including the AirPods Pro 2 with Hearing Aid Functionality, Apple Watch Series 10, and the M4 series of MacBook Pro models. AirPods Pro 2 with Hearing Aid Functionality – $190 (down from $249) AirPods Pro 2 are much more than standard earbud headphones, they also offer advanced features like hearing aid functionality for mild to moderate hearing loss, active noise cancellation, high fidelity sound, water and sweat resistance, Spatial Audio, custom fit, transparency mode, ear detection, a USB-C charging case, and more. AirPods Pro 2 – $190 (down from $249) M4 MacBook Pro 14″ & 16″ up to $320 Off The MacBook Pro with M4 chips is available at some great discounts on Amazon right now, in either the 14″ or 16″ display sizes in various configurations: M4 MacBook Pro 14″ 16GB / 512GB for $1449 (down from $1599 M4 MacBook Pro 14″ 24GB RAM / 1TB SSD for $1820 (down from $1999) M4 Max MacBook Pro 16″ 36GB / 1TB for $3179 (down from $3499) M3 iPad Air 11″ and 13″ – $565 (down from $599) and $759 (down from $799) The M3 iPad Air is brand new and Amazon is already offering a nice little discount from the retail price. The latest iPad Air offers a powerful M3 chip with Apple Intelligence support, Liquid Retina LCD display (virtually flicker free for those with PWM sensitivity), 128GB storage, 12MP front and rear camera, Touch ID on the power button, great battery life, support for Apple Pencil Pro, and is available in multiple color options. M3 iPad Air 11″ – $565 (down from $599 retail) M3 iPad Air 13″ – $759 (down from $799) Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399) Apple Watch Series 10 has excellent activity and fitness tracking, heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection with emergency SOS, fall detection with Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gestures, water and sweat resistance, voice control, Siri commands, all-day battery life, and more, and features a 42mm always-on display. Get Apple Watch Series 10 for $329 (down from $399 MSRP) AirTags 4-pack – $80 (down from $99) AirTag trackers make it easier than ever to track your stuff with the Find My network, whether that is your baggage, backpack, luggage, purse, bike, scooter, car, your dog or cat, horse or cow. AirTags – 4-pack – $80 (down from $99) EarBuds Wired Headphones – from $16 (down from $20) While AirPods are wildly popular and completely wireless, there’s a growing movement of people who like to use more traditional wired headphones instead of wireless, whether it’s with their iPhone, iPad, or Mac. Many people even prefer the wired headphones over wireless for various reasons. Apple still produces the classic white wired Apple EarPods headphones in USB-C, Lightning, and 3.5mm AUX, and right now Amazon is offering nice little discounts on each of them. Whether your device uses USB-C (like iPhone 15 and newer), Lightning (like the iPhone 14 Pro and older), or AUX 3.5mm (any older iPhone, Mac, or iPad with an AUX headphone jack), Amazon has them available with nice discounts: Get EarPods Wired Headphones – Lightning – $15.96 (down from $19.99) Get EarPods Wired Headphones – USB-C – $16.99 (down from $19.99) Get EarPods Wired Headphones – AUX 3.5mm – $16.99 (down from $19.99) Apple used to include these in the box with iPhone purchase, but now you must buy them separately. html:
Amazon is offering some fantastic deals on various Apple products, including the AirPods Pro 2 with Hearing Aid Functionality, Apple Watch Series 10, and the M4 series of MacBook Pro models.

AirPods Pro 2 with Hearing Aid Functionality – $190 (down from $249)

AirPods Pro 2 are much more than standard earbud headphones, they also offer advanced features like hearing aid functionality for mild to moderate hearing loss, active noise cancellation, high fidelity sound, water and sweat resistance, Spatial Audio, custom fit, transparency mode, ear detection, a USB-C charging case, and more.

  • AirPods Pro 2 – $190 (down from $249)

M4 MacBook Pro 14″ & 16″ up to $320 Off

The MacBook Pro with M4 chips is available at some great discounts on Amazon right now, in either the 14″ or 16″ display sizes in various configurations:

  • M4 MacBook Pro 14″ 16GB / 512GB for $1449 (down from $1599
  • M4 MacBook Pro 14″ 24GB RAM / 1TB SSD for $1820 (down from $1999)
  • M4 Max MacBook Pro 16″ 36GB / 1TB for $3179 (down from $3499)

M3 iPad Air 11″ and 13″ – $565 (down from $599) and $759 (down from $799)

The M3 iPad Air is brand new and Amazon is already offering a nice little discount from the retail price. The latest iPad Air offers a powerful M3 chip with Apple Intelligence support, Liquid Retina LCD display (virtually flicker free for those with PWM sensitivity), 128GB storage, 12MP front and rear camera, Touch ID on the power button, great battery life, support for Apple Pencil Pro, and is available in multiple color options.

  • M3 iPad Air 11″ – $565 (down from $599 retail)
  • M3 iPad Air 13″ – $759 (down from $799)

Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399)

Apple Watch Series 10 has excellent activity and fitness tracking, heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection with emergency SOS, fall detection with Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gestures, water and sweat resistance, voice control, Siri commands, all-day battery life, and more, and features a 42mm always-on display.

  • Get Apple Watch Series 10 for $329 (down from $399 MSRP)

AirTags 4-pack – $80 (down from $99)

AirTag trackers make it easier than ever to track your stuff with the Find My network, whether that is your baggage, backpack, luggage, purse, bike, scooter, car, your dog or cat, horse or cow.

  • AirTags – 4-pack – $80 (down from $99)

EarBuds Wired Headphones – from $16 (down from $20)

While AirPods are wildly popular and completely wireless, there’s a growing movement of people who like to use more traditional wired headphones instead of wireless, whether it’s with their iPhone, iPad, or Mac. Many people even prefer the wired headphones over wireless for various reasons. Apple still produces the classic white wired Apple EarPods headphones in USB-C, Lightning, and 3.5mm AUX, and right now Amazon is offering nice little discounts on each of them. Whether your device uses USB-C (like iPhone 15 and newer), Lightning (like the iPhone 14 Pro and older), or AUX 3.5mm (any older iPhone, Mac, or iPad with an AUX headphone jack), Amazon has them available with nice discounts:

  • Get EarPods Wired Headphones – Lightning – $15.96 (down from $19.99)
  • Get EarPods Wired Headphones – USB-C – $16.99 (down from $19.99)
  • Get EarPods Wired Headphones – AUX 3.5mm – $16.99 (down from $19.99)

Apple used to include these in the box with iPhone purchase, but now you must buy them separately.

FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
